doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 6 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 123[Air Date: 11/6/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 6 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 123[Air Date: 11/6/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. New York Executive Order #50 - a non-discrimination policy on city contactors2. Interview with Willy Smith, Gay and Lesbian Inter-Religious CoalitionCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native," with Quentin Crisp3. Interview with Nancy Roth, executive director of Gay Rights National Lobby, Washington D.C.COMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, Career Service Professionals4. AIDS fears in court5. Interview with Tim Sweeney, director of LAMBDA Legal Defense, discussing LAMBDA's AIDS Legal GuideCOMMERCIAL: "Rome Adventure," Orpheo Travel Agency6. Interview with Reverend Karen Zeigler, director of Metropolitan Community Church, discussing their on-going application to the National Council of ChurchesCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"7. Gay and lesbian child custody announcement8. LAMBDA Democrats, authors nightCOMMERCIAL: Arcos Blancos Resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico9. Heathline: Conversations with GMHC: Dr. Jeffrey Lawrence, NY Hospital, Cornell Medical Center, discusses new directions in treating AIDSCOMMERCIAL: "Badlands," NYC gay bar10. Sports Report: Interview with Jim Link and Leslie Randolph, Rambler Soccer Club
The Right Stuff:1. 1984 Halloween on Christopher Street, NYCCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay/lesbian newspaper2. Lo Nardo, music group, performingCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"3. Broadway star Vivian Blaine performing "live" at SAGE Benefit at the Limelight, NYC. Songs: "Guys and Dolls medley"COMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity with Abigail "Dear Abby" Van Buren4. Media Report: "Hollywood Babylon II," Japanese condoms, Cardinal Spellman, Michael Musto receives Village Voice columnCOMMERCIAL: Spur Production5. 1984 Halloween coverage/ Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 6 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 123[Air Date: 11/6/1984]: November 1984
